project.name: DHIS 2
project.description: DHIS 2 is a system for aggregation and reporting statistical data. The goal is to allow users to analyze and use this data to guide local action. The system is based around goals of empowering users, by allowing them to decide what to register and report data for.

RestrictImports.reason: Write JUnit 5 tests only; JUnit 4 cannot yet be excluded from our dependencies because of testcontainers issue https://github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-java/issues/970
Do not use this util. Use com.google.common instead
Do not use this util. Use com.google.common.lang3 instead
Do not use this common. Use org.apache.commons.collections4 instead
Do not use these annotations. Use javax.annotation instead
Do not use this json library. Use org.hisp.dhis.jsontree instead
Do not use this Transactional import. Use org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional instead
